Primary Merciless.Name: Primary Merciless
Primary Merciless.Description:
+30% Damage for 4s. Stacks up to 12x.
+30% Reload Speed

Magus Firewall.Name: Magus Firewall
Magus Firewall.Description: Generate Void Particles every 1s up to 6 particles, each granting 12.5% Damage Reduction for 60s. Taking damage consumes a particle

Virtuos Forge.Name: Virtuos Forge
Virtuos Forge.Description: Converts 98% Void Damage to Heat Damage.

Theorem Contagion.Name: Theorem Contagion
Theorem Contagion.Description: Standing in a zone created by a Residual Arcane creates a globe that orbits the player every 2s. The globes will strike the nearest enemy within 15m dealing 150 damage increasing their vulnerability to the globe’s damage type by 200% for 6s. Globes will persist for 30s upon leaving the zone.

Virtuos Trojan.Name: Virtuos Trojan
Virtuos Trojan.Description: Converts 98% Void Damage to Viral Damage.

Magus Destruct.Name: Magus Destruct
Magus Destruct.Description: Reduce Enemy Resistance to Puncture Damage by 65%

Melee Retaliation.Name: Melee Retaliation
Melee Retaliation.Description: Gain 30% Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to 420% Bonus halved for Overshields.

Melee Crescendo.Name: Melee Crescendo
Melee Crescendo.Description: Gain 6 Initial Combo for the rest of your mission

Arcane Acceleration.Name: Arcane Acceleration
Arcane Acceleration.Description: 30% chance for +90% Fire Rate to Primary Weapons (Excludes Shotguns) for 9s

Magus Overload.Name: Magus Overload
Magus Overload.Description: Stun robotic enemies for 3s, which then discharge Electricity Damage dealing 80% of their Max Health to anyone within 25m

Magus Elevate.Name: Magus Elevate

Melee Duplicate.Name: Melee Duplicate
Melee Duplicate.Description: 100% chance for your attack to strike a second time

Exodia Contagion.Criteria: After a Bullet Jump or Double Jump
